text: Gerald Neil "Gerry" Steinberg (20 April 1945 – 21 August 2015) was a Labour Party politician. He was Member of Parliament for the City of Durham from 1987 until his retirement in 2005. Steinberg was born in Durham. He died on 21 August 2015 after a long illness, aged 70.Gerry Steinberg dies at age 70, thenorthernecho.co.uk; accessed 22 August 2015.Notice of death of Gerry Steinberg, twitter.com; accessed 22 August 2015. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British teachers Category:Durham, England Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:People from County Durham Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005
title: Gerry Steinberg
